page.title: 14Children at Home
page.content: Most children in Goring do a lot of sport:football,tennis,horse riding, cricket and things like that.Nearly all children watch T.V. in their spare time.At weekends children do a lot of sport and on Saturday some children go down to the village to buy somthing.All children play with their friends some days of the week.Some children bring back home work to do.Mums and dads sometimes go with children on walks maybe to the river.Quite a few children go to piano lessons.Children like to ride bikes if they have one.Children usually go to a nearest park to play. A few children take their dogs for walks: boys and girls.
